channel.title: Join us! on Smart Fruit Phenomics Team
channel.description: Recent content in Join us! on Smart Fruit Phenomics Team
channel.copyright: © Smart Fruit Phenomics Team, Blueberry Breeding Program - 2023

item.description: The Smart Fruit Phenomics Team at the Blueberry Breeding and Genomics Laboratory is looking for students interested in applying engineering solutions for classifying blueberries. The team study methods for using robotic devices for improving multimodal phenotypic data and provide plant breeders with more accurate data. We are looking for students with experience / interest on the following areas Mechanical and electrical design (Fast prototyping, 3d printers, microcontrollers) Computer vision / A.

The Smart Fruit Phenomics Team at the Blueberry Breeding and Genomics Laboratory is looking for students interested in applying engineering solutions for classifying blueberries. The team study methods for using robotic devices for improving multimodal phenotypic data and provide plant breeders with more accurate data. We are looking for students with experience / interest on the following areas: Mechanical and electrical design (Fast prototyping, 3d printers, microcontrollers) Computer vision / A.
